question: Write a regex pattern to match 'Hello' only at the beginning of a line.
Write a regex pattern to match 'world' only at the end of a line.
Write a regex pattern to match 'cat' as a whole word.
Write a regex pattern to match 'cat' when it's part of another word, but not at the start or end of the word.
Write a regex pattern to match 'Start' only at the beginning of the entire string.
Write a regex pattern to match 'End' at the end of the string or just before the final newline.
Write a regex pattern to match 'Python' as a whole word at the end of a line.
Write a regex pattern to match 'un' at the start of a word, but not at the beginning of a line.
Write a regex pattern to match 'ing' at the end of a word, but not at the end of a line.
Write a regex pattern to match a word that starts with 'pre' and ends with 'tion', with any characters in between.
